#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    char number[5];
    int n,i,dig,quot,rem;
    
    cin>>number;
    
    while(strcmp(number,"#")!=0)
    {
                                n=0;
                                i=0;
                                while(number[i]!='\0')
                                {
                                                      n=n*10 + number[i++] - '0';
                                }
                                
                                if(n<5)
                                {
                                      switch(n)
                                      {
                                            case 1: dig = 1; break;
                                            case 2: dig = 4; break;
                                            case 3: dig = 9; break;
                                            case 4: dig = 6; break;
                                      }
                                }
                                
                                
                                
                                else
                                {
                                       rem=n%5;
                                       quot=n/5;
                                       
                                       if(quot%2==0)
                                       {
                                                    dig = (quot/2)*9 + (quot/2 - 1)*4;
                                                     switch(rem)   
                                                     {
                                                      case 0: dig += 0; break;
                                                      case 1: dig += 1; break;
                                                      case 2: dig += 7; break;
                                                      case 3: dig += 8; break;
                                                      case 4: dig += 4; break;
                                                     }
                                       }
                                       
                                       else
                                       {
                                                    dig = (quot/2)*9 + (quot/2)*4;
                                                     switch(rem)   
                                                     {
                                                      case 0: dig += 5; break;
                                                      case 1: dig += 1; break;
                                                      case 2: dig += 2; break;
                                                      case 3: dig += 8; break;
                                                      case 4: dig += 9; break;
                                                     }
                                       }
                                                           
                                }
                                cout<<dig%10<<'\n';
                                cin>>number;
    }
    return(0);
}
